figure_3: Result reporting rate per clinical trial registry.* *The count of registrations is inclusive of known cross-registrations for included trials, therefore the denominators will sum to >285. ANZCTR, Australian New Zealand Clinical Trials Registry; ChiCTR, Chinese Clinical Trial Registry; CRiS, Clinical Research Information Service (South Korea); CTRI, Clinical Trials Registry—India; EudraCT, European Union Drug Regulation Authorities Clinical Trials Database; IRCT, Iranian Registry of Clinical Trials; JapicCTR, Japan Pharmaceutical Information Center Clinical Trial Registry; PACTR, Pan African Clinical Trial Registry; RPCEC, Cuban Public Registry of Clinical Trials; SLCTR, Sri Lanka Clinical Trials Registry; UMIN-CTR, University Hospital, Medical Information Network Clinical Trial Registry.
figure_4: (A–C) Time to results across dissemination routes.
figure_5: Time to results dissemination from registered completion date—extended follow-up.
